cyclone.name: ANA
cyclone.current_location: about 65 miles SSE of Myrtle Beach, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to turn north then northeast, skirting the coasts of South and North Carolina before accelerating northeastward offshore of the Mid-Atlantic states
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the South Carolinaâ€“North Carolina border (close to Myrtle Beach, SC)

port.name: Port of Palm Beach District, FL

weather_observation.watch_coast: Edisto Beach, SC to south of South Santee River, SC
weather_observation.warning_coast: South Santee River, SC to Cape Lookout, NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Coasts of South Carolina and North Carolina, with later effects spreading northward along the Mid-Atlantic shoreline

weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected; occasional breezy easterly flow (below 25 kt) possible

weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated surf and rip-current risk along the southeast Florida coast
